comment: The line passing through the two different points ` X ` and ` Y ` in a real Euclidean space of dimension 2 in another "standard form" (usually with ` ( p `` 1 ) = x ` and ` ( p `` 2 ) = y ` ). (Contributed by AV, 23-Feb-2023.)
